items.title: Exploring the Universality and Plurality of Values
items.description: Using the free energy principle as a clue, we explore the relationship between the universality of truth, goodness, and beauty across eras and cultures, and the plurality of values.

items.title: Deciphering Society and History with Information and Thermodynamics
items.description: By reinterpreting Hannah Arendt's 'Worldliness' with information theory and Kojin Karatani's 'Modes of Exchange' with thermodynamics, we elucidate the dynamics of social structures and history.

items.title: The Law of Least Cost Towards Fated Harmony
items.description: Birth is natural, harmony is fated, and suffering is destined. Therefore, pragmatism as the 'Law of Least Cost Towards Fated Harmony' is the essence of the Value Emergence System.
